message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's a bit steep for me. I'm interested, but I'd be willing to pay $8,000.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I can meet you halfway at $11,000
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about $9,000?
I'm still a bit higher than you're willing to go, but I can meet you at $10,500
